contents.title: Find My Landlord
contents.description: Designed and wrote map based web app using publicly available data to help tenants find and organize with others who share the same landlord or property manager but live in different buildings.

children.value: Designed and wrote map based web app using publicly available data to help tenants find and organize with others who share the same landlord or property manager but live in different buildings.

contents.title: Realtime Game Server
contents.description: Designed a web socket enabled realtime server to support multiplayer boardgame-style video games.

children.value: Designed a web socket enabled realtime server to support multiplayer boardgame-style video games.

Implemented passwordless client authentication protocol that allows for a client to optionally represent more than 1 player in a game ‚Äì in an online multiplayer game, 3 people could play from the same computer while 2 other people play from their own computers.

contents.title: WILD
contents.description: Wrote ETL pipeline components from scratch and encapsulated them in a CLI app.

children.value: Wrote ETL pipeline components from scratch and encapsulated them in a CLI app.
Designed database schema using SQL scripting based database change management framework.

contents.title: PostGIS Sandbox
contents.description: Wrote boilerplate config for PostGIS Docker Compose service. Created documentation for how to load Shapefile data into a PostGIS database. Wrote shell scripts to execute various queries to generate GeoJSON objects using spatial joins.

children.value: Wrote boilerplate config for PostGIS Docker Compose service. Created documentation for how to load Shapefile data into a PostGIS database. Wrote shell scripts to execute various queries to generate GeoJSON objects using spatial joins.

contents.title: Optimized
contents.description: Architected a cross-platform modern React application using typescript and hooks to compose an easily comprehensible, flexible codebase. Implemented full stack customer subscription management system to seamlessly support legacy and new customers alike.

children.value: Architected a cross-platform modern React application using typescript and hooks to compose an easily comprehensible, flexible codebase. Implemented full stack customer subscription management system to seamlessly support legacy and new customers alike.

contents.title: Randstad
contents.description: Consulted for a major E-Commerce company whose name rhymes with Vest Guy. Consistently delivered new features in public-facing enterprise codebase. Lead developer on multiple sprints. Developed internal-facing modern React/Typescript application and coordinated with multiple teams to provision new backend resources and integrate SSO.

children.value: Consulted for a major E-Commerce company whose name rhymes with Vest Guy. Consistently delivered new features in public-facing enterprise codebase. Lead developer on multiple sprints. Developed internal-facing modern React/Typescript application and coordinated with multiple teams to provision new backend resources and integrate SSO.
